text: Have you ever heard of Save the Children?
I haven't!
It's basically what it sounds like
What kind of situations do they work with?
The organization helps children around the world with life, protecting them, coming to their aid when a crisis arises, helping them when necessary.
That sounds like an awesome organization! Do you know how someone can get involved?
They have a website. You can also make a .50 cent donation through me from your compensation of this hit. The donation will go towards food and/or aiding them with their health.
That's simple enough. I like the sound of that! Have you ever personally worked with them?

I have made donations in the past, yes. It made me feel good to know that I could provide some type of help especially because I have children of my own. The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
Gotcha! I also have a child, so I understand where you're coming from. I have a soft spot for children in general.
Same! Especially less fortunate children.
Absolutely! I always think about how I would want to know my child is cared for if I'm not around. It's definitely a motivator!
I agree. This is one of my favorite organizations to donate to and they're well known and have done so much for children all over.
That's good to know that they're reputable. Sometimes I'm cautious of donating, just because I want to know that they're making the difference that they saw they are.
At least here we know the researchers are making the donations through this hit.
It is nice to know that!
So you'd like to donate?!
Yes, I would :)
Awesome! Thank you so much :)
Oh yeah, absolutely!!
